channel.title: Aegis 718/740
channel.description:
Hey guys I am the proud owner of [url=http://aegisppc.com/forum/]http://aegisppc.com/forum/[/url] which has become a very well put together server. There are many things on the project list such as drygores and more bosses but we are proud to present our wonderful server. You can get the download from the forums provided and start playing today. SORRY FOR FORUMS BEING DOWN JAGEX GOT US BUT DONT WORRY WE GOT A NEW DOMAIN THEY CAN NOT TOUCH.
[video=youtube;9qzZJHQIF7A]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qzZJHQIF7A[/video]
[B]Server includes[/B] -Flawless PVP -Custom home -Custom Training locations and training rewards -Working Castle Wars -Barrows -Clanwars (clan vs clan on top of the white and red portals) -Barrows -Duel Arena -Fight Cave -Fight Pit -Dominion Tower -Crucible -All Gwd Bosses (all nex stages) -Tormented Demons -QBD all stages and animations -Hati -Glacors -Avatar -Custom Npc for spellbooks and prayer -Gano beasts for armor and polypore -Comp cape tasklist -Custom Shop area -Noticeboard at home -Highscores -Squeel of Fortune (custom items) -After eoc release items in the game -Missions -Custom Dung -Donator Capes and Zone -Excellent staff team -Custom Users -AND MUCH MUCH MORE
Update thread 1 [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/advertise/522640-aegis-official-update-thread.html#post4278249]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/advertise/522640-aegis-official-update-thread.html#post4278249[/url]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702752/abfd617d13150f36f0de0a0083249fe6.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702753/403baa1f52f7ba61ab948595bf50fc16.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702754/aa02991028c468874ac729a5830db482.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702755/bb2ee9c5e6f4f8400fdc131ad057843f.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702756/f4855a7a2cce8b2bc20f7fd4110f7a16.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702757/fbbd58913de5262bdb8fa76cd8ac1d09.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702758/d12c03f18402ce84cf23ceb61ae6ab95.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702759/0c89abc4a9c606a17576121045ddfb68.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702760/c220fdf43b92b15ae3059bbc33f791b9.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702761/0e6be0b4cfdee7e59601f1fbb337123f.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3702762/feeabdd042eb8baaa3f32fbddef4aa50.png[/img]

item.title: Aegis 718/740
item.dc:creator: @AegisRsPs AegisRsPs
item.description:
@AegisRsPs wrote:

Hey guys I am the proud owner of http://aegisppc.com/forum/ which has become a very well put together server. There are many things on the project list such as drygores and more bosses but we are proud to present our wonderful server. You can get the download from the forums provided and start playing today. SORRY FOR FORUMS BEING DOWN JAGEX GOT US BUT DONT WORRY WE GOT A NEW DOMAIN THEY CAN NOT TOUCH.

[video=youtube;9qzZJHQIF7A]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qzZJHQIF7A[/video]

[B]Server includes[/B]
-Flawless PVP
-Custom home
-Custom Training locations and training rewards
-Working Castle Wars
-Barrows
-Clanwars (clan vs clan on top of the white and red portals)
-Barrows
-Duel Arena
-Fight Cave
-Fight Pit
-Dominion Tower
-Crucible
-All Gwd Bosses (all nex stages)
-Tormented Demons
-QBD all stages and animations
-Hati
-Glacors
-Avatar
-Custom Npc for spellbooks and prayer
-Gano beasts for armor and polypore
-Comp cape tasklist
-Custom Shop area
-Noticeboard at home
-Highscores
-Squeel of Fortune (custom items)
-After eoc release items in the game
-Missions
-Custom Dung
-Donator Capes and Zone
-Excellent staff team
-Custom Users
-AND MUCH MUCH MORE

Update thread 1
